release_notes.en-US: Version 62.5. 1) Tabs border color in root was changed from black to grey. 2) Filter of tabmail tabs was changed to invert(1) hue-rotate(180deg) brightness(1.7). 3) Color of calendar view splitter was added to transparent. So, image, label of new loading tab and border of splitter are visible. 4) button-getmsg color was changed from grey to black. 5) button-newmsg color was changed from grey to black. 6) button-address color was changed from grey to black. 7) button-appmenu color was changed from grey to black. November 16th 2020. From Sungho Hwang.

description.en-US: Enjoy white without eye fatigue! FrameWhite is applicable/available in Dark theme! You can change calendar colors to Tools>Options>Calendar>Accessibility>Optimize colors for accessbility. About all-day persistence of this program. If not closing operating system, please, use Minimize on close. [Notification] 1) If you can not see the title and image of a loading tab, Please, click button of FrameWhite again. Basic tabs are open always in order of Mail tab, Calendar tab, Tasks tab, Add-ons Manager tab, Debugging tab, User info tab, Options tab. So, severity of this problem is not high to me. fixed in version 62.5. 2) FrameWhite does not support Compose window, Address book, Events and Tasks dialog IN TAB. 3) Is there any change in this theme after other action? Please, click button of FrameWhite again. 4) When FrameWhite enabled, Please, don't move icon to the other area, because moved icon is inverted in color. 5) Error found in v62.3. Please, don't change theme in state that 2nd tab is opened. fixed in version 62.5, it is changeable on any tab. Black or White was realized. send a gift to a friend Eunjo. [Next improvements] Would you give comments to this version for next improvements? I am On collecting improvements and On fixing them. Version 62.1 1) Quick Filter button text color was changed in black. 2) Calendar unifinder button icon (magnifying glass) color was changed in black. 3) Calendar list create button (cross) color was changed in black. 4) Task actions category button color was changed in black. 5) Task actions markcompleted button color was changed in black. 6) Task actions priority button color was changed in black. 7) Calendar delete task button color was changed in black. Version 62.2 updated in 2020-10-15. I like Compact Headers, but button of Compact Headers was not visible on FrameWhite. So, I changed message Header color of FrameWhite so that button of Compact Headers was shown. And, vague texts color of message header was changed to view them clearly. Version 62.3 updated in 2020-10-31. 1) Calendar list item(s) color(s) on Lightning side bar was/were inverted to 0.8. 2) Menu color at hover/active in menu bar was added in LightGrey. 3) Titlebar close button color at hover/active was changed from cyan to red. 4) Webextension-action(s) in tabs toolbar was/were inverted to 1. Version 62.5 updated in 2020-11-16. 1) Tabs border color in root was changed from black to grey. 2) Filter of tabmail tabs was changed to invert(1) hue-rotate(180deg) brightness(1.7). 3) Color of calendar view splitter was added to transparent. So, image, label of new loading tab and border of splitter are visible. 4) button-getmsg color was changed from grey to black. If using Folder pane toolbar or Customize toolbar, color of button-getmsg is changed in vague color. Be careful. 5) button-newmsg color was changed from grey to black. 6) button-address color was changed from grey to black. 7) button-appmenu color was changed from grey to black. 8) button-tag color was changed from grey to black. Version 62.6 Upcoming version submitted. 1) Colors of image, label of calendar new event button were changed from grey to black. 2) Colors of image, label of task new event button were changed from grey to black. 3) Colors of image, label of calendar edit button were changed from grey to black. 4) Colors of image, label of task edit button were changed from grey to black. 5) Colors of image, label of calendar delete button were changed from grey to black. 6) Colors of image, label of task delete button were changed from grey to black.
description.ko: Enjoy white without eye fatigue! FrameWhite is applicable/available in Dark theme! You can change calendar colors to Tools>Options>Calendar>Accessibility>Optimize colors for accessbility. [Notification] 1) If you can not see the title and image of a loading tab, Please, click button of FrameWhite again. Basic tabs are open always in order of Mail tab, Calendar tab, Tasks tab, Add-ons Manager tab, Debugging tab, User info tab, Options tab. So, severity of this problem is not high to me. 2) FrameWhite does not support Compose window, Address book, Events and Tasks dialog IN TAB. 3) Is there any change in this theme after other action? Please, click button of FrameWhite again. 4) When FrameWhite enabled, Please, don't move icon to the other area, because moved icon is inverted in color. 5) Error found in v62.3. Please, don't change theme in state that 2nd tab is opened. Error is corrected if repeating theme changes on mail tab. It is no problem if browserAction button is placed and used on mail toolbar. So, I decided that I would not do the fixed update for error. I am sorry for inconvenience. Black or White was realized. send a gift to a friend Eunjo. Version 62.1 1) Quick Filter button text color was changed in black. 2) Calendar unifinder button icon (magnifying glass) color was changed in black. 3) Calendar list create button (cross) color was changed in black. 4) Task actions category button color was changed in black. 5) Task actions markcompleted button color was changed in black. 6) Task actions priority button color was changed in black. 7) Calendar delete task button color was changed in black. Version 62.2 updated in 2020-10-15. I like Compact Headers, but button of Compact Headers was not visible on FrameWhite. So, I changed message Header color of FrameWhite so that button of Compact Headers was shown. And, vague texts color of message header was changed to view them clearly. Version 62.3 updated in 2020-10-31. 1) Calendar list item(s) color(s) on Lightning side bar was/were inverted to 0.8. 2) Menu color at hover/active in menu bar was added in LightGrey. 3) Titlebar close button color at hover/active was changed from cyan to red. 4) Webextension-action(s) in tabs toolbar was/were inverted to 1. Version 62.5 Upcoming version submitted. 1) Tabs border color in root was changed from black to grey. 2) Filter of tabmail tabs was changed to invert(1) hue-rotate(180deg) brightness(1.7). 3) Color of calendar view splitter was added to transparent. So, image, label of new loading tab and border of splitter are visible. 4) button-getmsg color was changed from grey to black. 5) button-newmsg color was changed from grey to black. 6) button-address color was changed from grey to black. 7) button-appmenu color was changed from grey to black. Next improvements Would you give comments to this version for next improvements? I am On collecting improvements and On fixing them.

caption.en-US: You can change calendar colors to Tools>Options>Calendar>Accessibility>Optimize colors for accessbility

summary.en-US:
V 62.5 is available with Tb v78, 84 now as of 2020-11-16.
Executed well.

Enjoy white without eye fatigue!
FrameWhite is applicable/available in Dark theme!

Black or White was realized.

send a gift to a friend Eunjo.
summary.ko:
다크 테마로 전환 가능한 화이트 테마입니다.
사용해본 결과, 눈의 피로가 적고 매혹적입니다.
다른 테마를 원할 때, [Disable white theme] 버튼을 눌러 다크 테마로 전환하세요.

친구 은조에게 선물로 보내며.

2020년 10월 31일.

개발자 황성호.
